attributes.action: put the health of the public first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe that the long history of the british government has been one of gross neglect carelessness and greed that knows no bounds.
our government on the one hand condemns the use of drugs such as heroin and crack cocaine which you would expect a responsible government to do.
but here is the hypocrasy of the british government...they have given the green light to the tobacco companies to ply their trade to the public in return for money.
now is that not a terrible thing?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
